name: Another Day of Hard Dedicated study: the VR game
name_original: Another Day of Hard Dedicated study: the VR game
description:
A simulation of a household where ADHD remains undiagnosed. Play as a young child who attempts to do a full days study whilst having undiagnosed ADHD. Within this experience you will attempt to study however you, as the player will be distracted by various "Goof items"

Credits:

Programming: Andrew Kellett

Design: Romanego Youhanna, Phil Arkley

Voice Actor: Jordan Gregory-Dunsmore
